details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.3 Artifacts - Standard roles
details.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in PDF Reference 9.7.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root.

rule.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in PDF Reference 9.7.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root.

error.message: Non-standard structure type is not mapped to a standard type
